GENESIS REACTION PROTOCOL (7-BYTE STANDARD)
=============================================
FORMAT: [ID] [HARDWARE] [STRENGTH] [DIRECTION] [FLOW1] [FLOW2] [FLOW3] # DESCRIPTION

# HARDWARE MAP: 00=Sys, 01=CPU, 02=RAM, 04=Disk, 05=Net, 06=Out, 10=Antenna, 12=Fan, 14=Firewall
# DIRECTION: 01010101=Vibrate, 11111111=Lock, 00001111=Expand, 11110000=Shrink, 10000000=Pull, 01111111=Push

# --- 1. DEFENSE (SURVIVAL) ---
00000001 00001010 11111111 01010101 11000000 00000000 00000000 # JOLT (Antenna) - Max Vibrate - Impact/Cut
00000010 00000100 11001000 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 # FREEZE (Disk) - Lock Write - Total Stasis
00000011 00000101 11111111 11001100 11110000 00000000 00000000 # SEVER (Network) - Cut Line - Sharp Peak/Drop
00000100 00000010 11111111 11100000 01010111 11110000 00000000 # PURGE (RAM) - Eject Data - Rapid Rise/Dump
00000101 00001110 10110100 11111111 01010111 11111111 11111111 # SHIELD (Firewall) - Block All - Shield Up/Hold
00000110 00000001 10010110 11110000 10101010 10100000 00000000 # THROTTLE (CPU) - Shrink - Slow Down/Fade
00000111 00000000 11001000 10000000 11111010 10100000 00000000 # RECOIL (Input) - Pull Back - Peak/Retreat
00001000 00000100 01100100 10101010 01010111 11111111 00000000 # HIDE (Files) - Obfuscate - Rise/Cover/Dark

# --- 2. COGNITIVE (ATTENTION) ---
00010000 00000001 11001000 11110000 01010101 11111111 11111111 # FOCUS (CPU) - Narrow - Steady Rise/Lock
00010001 00000000 10000000 00001111 01010101 10100101 01010101 # SCAN (Input) - Widen - Wave/Sweep/Wave
00010010 00000100 10110100 10000000 01010101 01010101 11111111 # DRILL (DB) - Deep Dive - Dig/Dig/Found
00010011 00000000 01000000 11111111 10101010 00000000 00000000 # IGNORE (Input) - Filter - Fade Out
00010100 00000010 01100100 01010101 11111111 00000000 00000000 # MARK (RAM) - Tag - Flash/Mark
00010101 00000001 10010110 01010101 01010101 01010101 10101010 # COMPARE (Logic) - Oscillate - A/B/A/B
00010110 00000001 11001000 00001111 01010111 11111111 10101010 # PREDICT (GPU) - Project - Rise/Simulate/End
00010111 00000001 01100100 10101010 01011010 01011010 01011010 # DOUBT (Logic) - Loop - Circle/Circle

# --- 3. METABOLIC (ENERGY) ---
00100000 00000000 00001010 00000000 10101010 00000000 00000000 # SLEEP (System) - Null - Slow Fall/Void
00100001 00000000 11001000 00001111 01010101 01010101 11111111 # WAKE (System) - Expand - Rise/Rise/Ready
00100010 00000000 10110100 10000000 01010111 11111111 11111111 # HUNGER (Input) - Pull - Crave/Hold
00100011 00000001 11001000 00000000 11111111 10101010 00000000 # SATISFY (Logic) - Settle - Peak/Relax
00100100 00000001 11111111 01111111 11111111 11111111 10101010 # OVERCLOCK (CPU) - Push - Max/Max/Drop
00100101 00001100 11001000 00001111 01010101 11111111 10101010 # HEAT (Fan) - Radiate - Spin Up/Cool
00100110 00000000 10000000 01010101 01010101 11111111 11111111 # SYNC (Clock) - Align - Tick/Tock/Lock
00100111 00000100 01100100 00001111 01010101 11111111 11111111 # GROW (Storage) - Expand - Rise/Occupy

# --- 4. INTERFACE (SOCIAL) ---
00110000 00001010 01000000 01010101 11000000 00000000 00000000 # PING (Antenna) - Pulse - Blip
00110001 00000101 11111111 11111111 01010111 11111111 11111111 # LATCH (Net) - Lock - Connect/Hold
00110010 00000110 10000000 01010101 01010111 10101010 00000000 # ECHO (Output) - Reflect - Receive/Return
00110011 00000110 11111111 11111111 10100000 00000000 00000000 # MUTE (Output) - Block - Cut Audio
00110100 00001010 11001000 00001111 01010111 11111111 10101010 # BEACON (Antenna) - Radiate - Broadcast
00110101 00000101 10010110 01010101 01010101 01010101 10100000 # SEEK (Net) - Scan - Search/Search
00110110 00001110 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 # TRUST (Firewall) - Open - Vulnerable
00110111 00000110 11001000 01111111 11111111 10101010 00000000 # REJECT (Output) - Push - No/Stop
